name: ForeignAssistance.gov
description: The ForeignAssistance.gov website provides a view of U.S. Government foreign assistance funds and enables users to examine, research, and track aid investments in a standard and easy-to-understand format. The ForeignAssistance.gov website was initiated by the Department of State and USAID under the policy guidance of the National Security Council. Future iterations of the site will be developed in consultation with U.S. Government agencies receiving or implementing foreign assistance.
